1. Many patients take appointment and coming late, considering the urgency of the patient, we need to accommodate them in between.
2. Few sick walk-in babies enter clinic without appointment, they need immediate attention.
3. Sometimes a newborn baby comes without mother, that need to be seen urgently otherwise he/she will keep crying of hunger.
4. It's not always the patient which increases waiting time, occasionally doctor also get stuck in hospital emergency or traffic, then everyone's waiting time increases.
Regards
Dr Pawan Kumar
